    • Method Detail

      • getApplicationType

        public ApplicationType getApplicationType(Subject subject,
                                          String applicationName)
                                   throws EntitlementException
        Get the application type already present in the system. Application Type is matched first based on the name of the application if not found then matched based on ApplicationTypeManager.URL_APPLICATION_TYPE_NAME.
        Parameters:
        subject - Admin subject.
        applicationName - Name of the application for the request is made.
        Returns:
        ApplicationType retrieved.o
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - if no results found.
